title: Strengthening Healthcare Practice Competencies: Learning Progression (LP)-Based Approach for Understanding Particle Nature of Matter

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of foundational chemistry and physics concepts (atoms, molecules, phase changes, etc.)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain the Particle Nature of Matter (PNM) concept according to a four-stage (foundational, developmental, integrative, and extended) learning progression.
Learners can interpret everyday phenomena (e.g., evaporation, dissolution) at the particle level and correct conceptual errors.
Learners acquire scientific reasoning skills to connect microscopic particle models with macroscopic observational phenomena.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
